ygData.subject: Just my own update on the "campfest"
ygData.msgSnippet: Spent 12 hours camping yesterday. 11am to 11pm. Other than our lack of success, had a blast. 3-5 SK s, lvls 30 (me!) to 42. One cleric. Up to five dark reavers
ygData.messageBody:
Spent 12 hours camping yesterday. 11am to 11pm.

Other than our lack of success, had a blast. 3-5 SK's, lvls 30 (me!) to 42.
One cleric. Up to five dark reavers at a time. Wow. What we lacked in nuking
power we DEFINITELY made up for in staying power. We had some battles last
upwards of 15 minutes, nonstop. We just hacked and slashed and slashed some
more. Our poor cleric. We just recruited her out of the blue. She was
japanese and hardly spoke english at all, but DAMN was she a good cleric.
One of the better I have ever ever had the pleasure of being healed by.

In the end, though, we got .....

a decayed right glove.

And that was at about 10pm when the first SK was there waiting for the rest
of us. During our 12 hours stint we actually got nothing.

And for those of you that haven't fought crusaders. My GOD are they tough.

Tell me this: Why is it that NPC SK's are just AWESOME (Lord Grimrot,
Hollish Tnoops, now Crusaders) but PC SK's suck so bad? Explain that to me.

Oh well. I'm glad to see this list be so active lately. And we've all be
sharing info and helping each other out. The one positive that has come out
of this quest nonsense for me, at least, is that all the SK's (the like 15
of us) on Solusek Ro are banding together to work with each other and help
each other out. We've always all been friends, but to see us all working
together instead of trying to one-up each other like I see the Paladins and
rangers etc doing, well, brings a tear to my evil eyes.

Good luck everyone! Someone get at least ONE piece out there, and let us
know, so we have a little hope!! (and if it is pink, is 3 ac, and -10 str,
dex, agil, and -50 all saves, please keep it to yourself. Thanks. ;D)

Virten,
Knight of Innoruuk
30th Circle of Hate
